double estimateTransformation (std::vector< CorrespondencePoint3DPair > *pointPairs, IHomogeneousMatrix44 *resultTransformation)
 Estimates the rigid transformation between two corresponding point clouds.

Detailed Description

Implementation of rigid transformation estimation between two corresponding point clouds.

This implementation uses a ORTHO TODO based error function for the ICP.

Member Function Documentation

double brics_3d::RigidTransformationEstimationORTHO::estimateTransformation ( std::vector< CorrespondencePoint3DPair > *  pointPairs,
IHomogeneousMatrix44 *  resultTransformation 
) [virtual]

Estimates the rigid transformation between two corresponding point clouds.

Parameters:
[in]pointPairsPointer to point correspondences between points of pointCloud1 and pointCloud2
[out]resultTransformationPointer to resulting rigid transformation, represented as a homogeneous matrix
Returns:
Returns the RMS point-to-point error

NOTE: A function with two point clouds a correspondence representation based on CorrespondenceIndexPair might be more efficient, as the pointPairs vector does not need to be filled, but this implies that however the correspondences are established, the underlying structure is based on a vector. This assumption does not always hold e.g. the k-d tree does not necessarily store its data in a consecutive vector.

Implements brics_3d::IRigidTransformationEstimation.
